doctor.name: Dr. Hasina Akhter Rekha
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Hasina Akhter Rekha is a Gynecologist in Bogra. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (OBGYN), FCPS (OBGYN). She is a Assistant Professor, Gynecology & Obstetrics at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Hasina Akhter Rekha at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra is 4pm to 8pm (Sat to Thu) & 10am to 12pm (Fri).

chamber.hospital: Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra
